name: IQ Gain
description: This game is about clicking a brain to gain IQ. You can gain IQ easier by using the shop. The shop will give you items that will gain your IQ. In the shop, you can get auto IQ, which will gain your IQ every second, and IQ clicker, which gains the number by the amount you have on the IQ clicker to the clicks you do to the brain. The last thing is a button that can end the whole planet. If you get to the end, you will get gifts and a surprise!!!!
